abstract: The new manager of the Chicago White Sox has never managed or coached before. But if you're a fan of the Mets or the Yankees, you know him well.
snippet: The new manager of the Chicago White Sox has never managed or coached before. But if you're a fan of the Mets or the Yankees, you know him well.
lead_paragraph: Robin Ventura re-joined the Chicago White Sox organization over the summer, as an advisor to the farm director Buddy Bell. He did not aspire to manage, he said, because he believed Ozzie Guillen would stay in the job for a while. It was just a toe in the water.

headline.main: Surprise! Robin Ventura Takes Over the White Sox
